author: Anushka Basu
title: Bitcoin smashes record high but greed remains in check
description: Bitcoin surpasses $118K as whales stay quiet and exchange inflows fall to decade lows, signaling low pressure.
content:
Bitcoin smashes record high but greed remains in check originally appeared on TheStreet.
Bitcoin's price surged past $118,000 on July 11, a new all-time high for BTC. In particular, this rally saw $â€¦ [+2311 chars]
